convertMessage

private java.lang.Object convertMessage(MessageContext context)
Attempts to convert the body of the incoming message from a byte array. The output of this method is dependent on the consumer's configuration, the content-type of the message, and the existence of an appropriately defined handler for the converted type.
Parameters:
context
Returns:

static java.util.List startConsumer(com.rabbitmq.client.Connection connection, org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.GrailsClass handler)
Starts a consumer against a handler.
Parameters:
connection - Connection to the RabbitMQ server.
